title: Miu Miu offers a lesson in modern femme fatale dressing
text:
Miu Miu - Miuccia Prada's familial nickname - is quirky little sister to Prada's off-kilter woman. While Prada catwalks have a grown-up darkness, Miu Miu shows offer a lighter, younger lilt on its creator's design language: subversion-lite.

Print, colour and embellishment are all usually givens in a Miu Miu collection, and all piled on top of one another. Crystals, feather, faux-fur... There were touches of them in the spring/summer 2020 collection, shown on the final day of Paris Fashion Week on Tuesday. Touches, where normally you'd find dollops.

The tone was set by the catwalk, and the tiered seating surrounding it - both were chipboard, not a fabric that screams luxury or excess. It was a dose of rawness that hinted at the clothes to come: there had been a general stripping back and simplifying.
description: Miu Miu - Miuccia Prada's familial nickname - is quirky little sister to Prada's off-kilter woman.
